text: Land Rover is a brand of the British Jaguar Land Rover company. The brand is used on cars (SUV's). Land Rover vehicles are supplied to the British Army. The original Land Rover car dates back to 1949, and was designed by Maurice Wilks. 1947 As of 2021, the Land Rover brand is used on seven ranges of vehicle: the Defender, Discovery, Discovery Sport, Range Rover Evoque, Range Rover Sport, Range Rover, and Range Rover Velar. == Models == === DC100 === File:2012-03-07 Motorshow Geneva 4353.JPG|link=|Land Rover DC100 (2011) File:Land Rover DC100 Sport (6149244943).jpg|link=|Land Rover DC100 Sport (2012) === Defender === File:Land Rover Defender L316 90 China 2014-04-25.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender (1990) File:Lochau-Gigersacker- Altreute No 1-Mountain rescue car (Land Rover L316)-03ASD.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender LGA (1993) File:Land Rover Defender L316 90 01 China 2018-04-03.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender (2007) File:Land Rover Creates Tailor-Made Defender For Paul Smith (16901650052).jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender Creates Tailor Made (2012) File:More Rugged Appeal With the Land Rover Defender Special Edition (7541305694).jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender X-Tech (2012) File:2013 Land Rover Defender (L316 MY13) 130 4-door utility (2015-11-11) 01.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender Pick-Up (2013) File:2015 Land Rover Defender (L316 MY15) 90 3-door wagon (2015-10-24) 01.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender (2015) File:Land Rover Defender (L663) at IAA 2019 IMG 0688.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender (2020) File:Royal Thai Army, Land Rover Defender 110 artillery towing vehicle..jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender Royal Thai Army (2021) File:2023 Land Rover Defender 90.jpg|link=|Land Rover Defender (2023) === Discovery === File:Land Rover Discovery SI maroon front q.jpg|link=|Land Rover Discovery (1989) File:2001 Land Rover Discovery Series II E 2.5 Td5 (Front -
